author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Atari Announces Two Blockchains And Crypto-Currencies Development Projects
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Atari Sa:
* ANNOUNCES TWO BLOCKCHAINS AND CRYPTO-CURRENCIES DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
* TAKES 15% STAKE IN INFINITY NETWORKS LTD (GIBRALTAR) * SAYS CREATION OF ATARI TOKEN * SECOND PROJECT IN PROGRESS IS THE STRENGTHENING OF THE PARTNERSHIP WITH PARIPLAY,
* SAYS INFINITY NETWORKS PLATFORM, CURRENTLY UNDER CONTRUCTION, WILL WORK USING CRYPTOCURRENCY, ATARI TOKEN
* SECOND PROJECT: IN ORDER TO LAUNCH IN 2018 CASINO PLATFORMS ACCEPTING CRYPTOCURRENCY
* DETAILS OF LAUNCH OF CRYPTO-CASINOS TO BE ANNOUNCED SOON * SAYS IN EXCHANGE FOR STAKE, PARTICIPATION IN EARNINGS AND FUTURE ROYALTIES OF INFINITY NETWORKS, GRANTS THEM LONG-TERM LICENSE TO USE ATARI BRAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
